jspecview.common

Class DisplayScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • jspecview.common.DisplayScheme
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Parameters

    public class DisplayScheme
extends Object
    This a representation of the Display Scheme for the spectral display.
    Author:
    Debbie-Ann Facey, Khari A. Bryan, Prof Robert J. Lancashire
    See Also:
    JSVPanel
